summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details the charges for two shipments made on January 25 and January 26, 2005, including transportation charges and discounts applied.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual to whom the invoice is addressed, indicating he is the account holder for the FedEx services.

persons.name: Cecilia
persons.context: Cecilia is mentioned as the recipient of one of the packages sent via FedEx.

persons.name: Lauren Maria Hodge
persons.context: Lauren Maria Hodge is mentioned as the recipient of another package sent via FedEx.

events.title: FedEx Shipment Pickup
events.description: A package was picked up by FedEx for shipment on January 25, 2005.

events.title: FedEx Shipment Pickup
events.description: A package was picked up by FedEx for shipment on January 26, 2005.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843
keyFacts: The invoice is dated January 31, 2005, and is for a total amount of $66.60.
Two shipments were made, one to Cecilia and another to Lauren Maria Hodge.
The invoice includes details of transportation charges and discounts applied.
The shipments were picked up on January 25 and January 26, 2005.
The document indicates a fuel surcharge applied to the shipments.
